item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, March 8, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump threatens Russia with additional sanctions and tariffs
2. Poland must look at acquiring nuclear weapons, says Donald Tusk
3. Trump restrains Elon Musk’s Doge as concern mounts over job losses
4. Doug Ford, the defiant Canadian politician taking on Trump
5. ‘Druckonomics’: Wall St veteran poised to shape the new US economic order
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, March 8, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
